fields.name: Truffle Ravioli by Borgo de' Medici
fields.description: Truffle Ravioli are ravioli pieces filled with Italian truffle. Made from natural Italian ingredients this simple ravioli filled with truffle is light and easy to make. Ravioli became the largest dry-filled pasta in Italy today due to the careful selection of raw materials and innovative production processes to work together to maintain and improve their mission of tradition and quality for over 60 years.

fields.name: Garofalo Casarecce Gluten-Free Pasta
fields.description: Enjoy Garofalo Casarecce Gluten-Free Pasta made from corn, rice and quinoa with thick, rustic Sicilian and Italian sauces. These golden, scroll-like pasta noodles are also an excellent source of fiber.

fields.name: Rustichella D'Abruzzo Bucatini
fields.description: Rustichella D’Abruzzo Bucatini pasta is a thick and cylindrical-shaped Italian pasta; a thick version of spaghetti with a continuous hole through the middle. Sauces and seasonings can flow inside the middle top of the pasta; enhancing flavor and aroma. Bucatini pasta is great with sauces, seasonings, and meats; tomato sauce, cream sauces, seafood. Use Rustichella D’Abruzzo Bucatini Italian pasta in the next pasta dish.

fields.name: Pirro Tagliatelle with Black Calabria Truffle
fields.description: Pirro Tagliatelle with Black Calabria Truffle infuses the rich, luxurious taste of summer truffle from the Italian region of Calabria into your pasta dish. In all its forms, the truffle is a highly sought-after, gourmet ingredient. Black truffles are a delicacy, and any meal you cook with them will be, too!

fields.name: Pirro Filei Calabresi Pasta
fields.description: Pirro Filei Calabresi Pasta is a medium-length, rolled pasta noodle from Calabria. The hollow center of Pirro Filei Calabresi Pasta allows various sauces to really permeate the dish. Add ricotta cheese to this pasta dish to pack even more flavor into Pirro Filei Calabresi Pasta.

fields.name: De Cecco #12 Spaghetti Bulk Pasta
fields.description: De Cecco Spaghetti Pasta is a long and cylindrical-shaped Italian pasta. Spaghetti is one of Italy’s most known type of pasta. This Italian pasta has many recipe variations; from spaghetti with tomato sauce and meatballs to spaghetti with clams. Innovate the dish to personal taste.

fields.name: Giuseppe Cocco Spaghetti (Ruvida)
fields.description: Giuseppe Cocco Spaghetti pasta is “cylindrical-shaped” and long Italian pasta. Spaghetti is a classic and most common Italian pasta. Spaghetti has many marvelous recipe variations: from spaghetti with tomato sauce and meatballs to spaghetti with creamy sauce. Used this excellent Italian pasta in the next pasta dish.

fields.name: Garofalo No.70 Penne Ziti Rigate Pasta
fields.description: The rough, ridged surface of Garofalo Penne Ziti Rigate makes it an excellent pasta for absorbing sauce. This pasta of Gragnano, Italy is a high gluten pasta with optimal cooking resistance, ensuring a satisfying al dente bite of ziti. Enjoy it with your favorite tomato-based sauces or in baked pasta dishes.

fields.name: Garofalo No.22 Capellini Spezzati Pasta
fields.description: Garofalo Capellini Spezzati Pasta is a very short, thin pasta noodle that is used mainly for soup recipes. Pair it with chicken broth, beef broth, or vegetable broth along with diced, freshly cooked vegetables.

fields.name: ORGANIC ORECCHIETTE PUGLIESI
fields.description: Orecchiette, or "little ears", is a shape of pasta hailing from the region of Puglia, Italy. This orecchiette is delicately shaped to create the perfect sauce and condiment-gripping form. Try with your favorite pesto!  Use with vegetable dishes that include zucchini, fresh peas, and golden squash.

fields.name: VESUVIO PASTA DI GRAGNANO
fields.description: Vesuvio is a pasta version of Mt. Vesuvius, the stratovolcano in the Gulf of Naples best known for its eruption in the first century. The selected semolina wheat used in this pasta is strictly of Italian origin and of the best quality, including the Senatore Capelli variety which is renowned for cooking to al-dente. It also gives the pasta a golden color. Bronze cut pasta molds create a rough and porous texture much like homemade pasta. The low temperature drying method known as cirillo preserves the distinct texture and aroma.

fields.name: ORGANIC CASARECCE PASTA DI GRAGNANO
fields.description: Casarecce means “homemade.” It is a shape typical of Sicily and central southern Italy. It is a twist of pasta that holds sauce well. The selected semolina wheat used in this pasta is strictly of Italian origin and of the best quality, including the Senatore Capelli variety which is renowned for cooking to al-dente. It also gives the pasta a golden color. Bronze cut pasta molds create a rough and porous texture much like homemade pasta. The low temperature drying method known as cirillo preserves the distinct texture and aroma.

fields.name: UMBRIAN EGG PASTA LASAGNA SQUARES
fields.description: These fresh squares of golden egg pasta are great for homemade lasagnas, giant or open-faced ravioli, or rolled cannelloni style pasta dishes. Wonderful to precook and have on-hand to use throughout the week for quick meals.

fields.name: ORGANIC LASAGNE IGP
fields.description: Quality ingredients are essential in making a favorite comfort food such as Lasagna - elavate your favorite dish from good to amazing. Pastiﬁcio Gentile Lasagne IGP sheets will transform your next recipe with its, aroma, texture and homemade taste, allowing all of your ingredients to meld together perfectly. This is a pasta Nonna would be proud to serve!

fields.name: EGG LINGUINE NESTS
fields.description:
Linguine hand formed pasta nests. Filotea produces dry egg pasta using the finest raw materials; fresh eggs, durum wheat semolina flour and 00 flour, following a unique recipe and artisan preparation method.  The result is an egg pasta that is reminiscent of a homemade one, traditionally prepared by grandmothers. It is light and easy to digest, while its textured surface helps to absorb the sauces, thus exalting the flavor of all the ingredients. Filotea is regarded as one of the 'Top Italian Food & Beverage Experience' by the leading Gambero Rosso guide.

Please enjoy “al dente”. Cooking time, 6 - 8 minutes. Do not stir until the end of cooking time.

fields.name: TAGLIATELLE
fields.description: Made according to family tradition since 1800, Benedetto Cavalieri's tagliatelle pasta is the ultimate tagliatelle. The hard durum wheat or semolina used is higher in protein than softer flour types, a result of careful slow drying in antique ovens. This pasta is passed through special bronze dies for a rough-textured surface to which sauce clings rather than slipping off. The result is a naturally nutty flavor that complements your favorite seafood, vegetables, and meat pasta dishes.

fields.name: TROFIE PASTA
fields.description: This Ligurian specialty is the classic companion to Genovese Pesto. Hand-rolling and slow air-drying give trofie pasta a unique firm texture and shape. Perfect with pesto or any fresh pasta sauce.

fields.name: ARTICHOKE LEAF PASTA
fields.description: Another incredible pasta from the Casina Rossa estate. This delicate pasta is shaped like an artichoke leaf and infused with the natural flavors of artichoke puree. Goes perfect with seafood, soups, and pasta bianco sauce. Made with 100% durum semolina.

fields.name: OLIVE LEAF PASTA WITH SPINACH
fields.description: Pasta di Liguria classic olive leaf-shaped pasta is delicately flavored with spinach. Try  Foglie D'Ulivo pasta with creamy vegetable sauces, extra virgin olive oil and fresh herbs.

fields.name: SOQQUADRO
fields.description: Soqquadro is a hollow square shape of pasta. Grinding only the finest wheat available by hand with stone millstones and water from Gran Sasso, Verrigni is the only producer in Italy that uses gold dyes to extrude their regional cuts of pasta. Verrigni's gold cut pastas have a different consistency than those cut with bronze molds. The pasta is dried in camerinas (small rooms with specially designed fans that keep the temperature of the pasta between 45 and 50 degrees), which is the ideal temperature for slow air drying pasta. When cooked, its absorption is rapid, and the pasta has a more intense wheat taste and a bright yellow color.

fields.name: Barolo Bric Cenciurio 2017
fields.description: Great body and soft tannins with intense and open aromas award this Barolo of full-body and great elegance, complex and fragrant, you can drink it young but it also has a great attitude to age

fields.name: Refosco dal Peduncolo Rosso Vitas 2019
fields.description: Rich and full bouquet offering a wide range of sensations, mainly berries and sweet spices, for this wine produced by a winery with a secular family tradition

fields.name: Cabernet Girapoggio Ca' Lustra 2016
fields.description: Rich bouquet with hints of fresh grass, blackberries, chocolate, cinnamon, coffee and licorice; in the mouth the tannins are evident and balance well with the fullness of ripe cherry and blackcurrant

fields.name: San Francesco Cirò Fattoria San Francesco 2018
fields.description: This red wine, produced in the heart of Calabria by one of the historical companies in the region, has a spicy, ethereal aroma and a dry, warm, well-balanced taste

fields.name: Ronco dei Quattroventi Fattoria San Francesco 2017
fields.description: This red cru, which is produced in the heart of Calabria by one of the historical companies in the region, has a very strong, lingering aroma that is rich and spicy, full and ethereal. It has a very fine, dry taste that is warm and well-balanced.

fields.name: Ribolla Gialla Petrucco 2020
fields.description: Delicated and crispy wine, with hints of grapefruit, wild flowers and aromatic herbs. It is produced by a small, family-owned winery, settled in the hearth of Colli Orientali del Friuli

fields.name: Pinot Grigio Petrucco 2020
fields.description: Fresh and fruity wine, with a clear aroma of apple, pear and exotic fruit. It is produced by a small, family-owned winery, settled in the hearth of Colli Orientali del Friuli.

fields.name: Pinot Grigio Zemmer Peter 2020
fields.description: The prominent nose, as well as the excellent acid balance, lend this wine, produced by on of the oldest wineries of Alto Adige, power and structure

fields.name: Schiena Vini Salento Enneoro Negroamaro 2017
fields.description: An alluring ruby in the glass, this wine bursts with juicy red and brambly blue fruits, warm pipe tobacco, potpourri, grilled herbs, and touches of pepper and ash. This is a beautiful, velvety big red that grips the palate with chewy tannins as elegant acidity propels the wine’s mineral-inflected finish. This mono-varietal Negroamaro is grown with sustainable practices and harvested by hand; grapes ferment for 8 to 10 days in temperature-controlled stainless steel, and the wine ages for five months in steel before bottling.

fields.name: Friulano Vitas 2020
fields.description: Bitter almond and fruity notes for this wine produced by a winery with a secular family tradition

fields.name: Podere del Vento Tenuta di Frassineto 2018
fields.description: Red wine without added sulphites, elegant with scents of red flowers and well-marked fruity notes like sour cherry and wild berries, delicate notes of spices complete the olfactory baggage, the tannins are of the highest quality, supported by a lively acidity and a good alcohol content which gives the wine a very good drink

fields.name: Barbarossa Fattoria Paradiso 2015
fields.description: This red wine is obtained from a rare species of grapevine cultivated in the heart of Romagna by one of the best wine-makers in the area. It has a strong, austere and long-lasting aroma, reminiscent of the withered rose and violets. It tastes dry, frank and generous

fields.name: Trebbiano d'Abruzzo Fonte a Monte Di Berardino 2020
fields.description: Intense fruity notes of pear, peach and tropical fruits characterize this white wine made from Trebbiano grapes in the heart of Abruzzo by a small emerging winery

fields.name: Orvieto Noe dei Calanchi D'Amico Paolo e Noemia 2019
fields.description: Composed of a variety of grapevines that confers it a very definite aroma, polished and fresh, has an inkling of white flowers an white fleshy fruits, that results wrapping both at the nose and at the palate

fields.name: Verdeca Cantine Menhir 2019
fields.description: Made 100% from the native Verdeca grape variety, the taste is intense, dry, subtle and with pleasant, strong flavour, the bouquet is like a typical fragrance of white rock flowers and candied fruit

fields.name: Lugana Cascina Ardea Tognazzi 2020
fields.description: A delicate fragance and freshness characterize this white wine produced by a small family-run company

fields.name: Principe di Corleone Inzolia Pollara 2020
fields.description: Strong personality and an only wealth organolectic distinguish this white dry wine produced in the heart of Sicily by a firm which does of quality its ensign

fields.name: Gavi Montobbio 2019
fields.description: A great elegance, richness of scents, a fine and persistent bouquet, a full, fresh, fruity and armonic flavour for this dry white wine produced in Castelletto D'Orba in the heart of the southern Monferrato, by a little winehouse devoted to quality

fields.name: Custoza Vigne di San Pietro 2019
fields.description: An exceptionally fruity and aromatic white wine, produced on the hills of Garda, by one of the best producers of the area

fields.name: Falanghina Clarum I Capitani 2019
fields.description: Dry, soft white wine with fresh fruit and flowery notes, made mainly from selected grapes of autochthonous Falanghina

fields.name: Coffee Pods ESE Aromagic Barbera
fields.description:
20 Barbera Caffè ESE pods

60% Arabica - 40% Robusta

A magical coffee from Southern Italy for the most demanding taste buds!

fields.name: Saturno Caffè Miscela Cremacaffè
fields.description:
1000g bag of whole beans

Masterful art of roasting since 1952

25% Arabica - 75% Robusta

Chocolate flavours

fields.name: Saturno Caffè Miscela Bar Super - Espresso Italiano
fields.description:
1000g bag of whole beans

Masterful art of roasting since 1952

66% Arabica - 34% Robusta

Balanced blend

fields.name: Lucaffe Classic Espresso Coffee
fields.description:
Espresso beans 1000g

A beautiful coffee with a fine, chocolaty aroma and long-lasting and full crema. Lucaffe’s bestseller.

fields.name: Segafredo Intermezzo Espresso Ground Coffee
fields.description: Robusta coffee blend with a strong character, balanced by South American Arabica. It has an intense taste and an aroma with hints of almond.

fields.name: Kimbo Aroma Gold Coffee Beans 100% Arabica
fields.description: An extraordinary 100% Arabica blend of premium coffee beans sourced from Central and South America. With a delicate flavour and rich smooth aroma, this coffee astounds with its distinctive personality and unmistakable taste.

fields.name: Kimbo Espresso Audace Coffee Beans
fields.description: The Kimbo experience can now be savoured in its new line dedicated exclusively to Vending professionals: now available at Coffeerista. The selection of the fiest beans, a careful blending and skilful roasting all guarantee an espresso that is always perfect.

fields.name: Lavazza Tierra Colombia coffee beans
fields.description: Aromatic harmony and a smooth taste are exalted by the typical sweetness, with a refined acidity and rich body. Hints of tropical fruits combined with the scent of lime zest and jasmine flowers, with a sweet liqueur aftertaste. Roasting is long, delicate and “gentle”, thanks to the traditional drum method which preserves aromas and guarantees a lingering flavor. 100% arabica

fields.name: Pellini Espresso Bar no.82 Vivace Beans
fields.description: Full-bodied and well-balanced in taste and aroma intensity for a strong Italian espresso.

fields.name: Caffè Vergnano 1882 Gran Aroma Beans
fields.description: The ideal blend for those who appreciate creaminess in a strong coffee, with an intense flavour and a hint of spice. Gran Aroma is the perfect harmony of aroma and body.

fields.name: De Roccis Ciao Caffé Rosso Espresso beans
fields.description: 20% arabica and 80% robusta beans from Africa and Asia. Intense rich flavor with a golden crema.

fields.name: Illy Intenso (Dark) Roast Beans
fields.description: Bright, rich and energetic, it gets straight to the point. Marked counterpoints of flavors with pronounced chocolate aroma, blending with toast and caramel.

fields.name: Carraro Delizia beans
fields.description: Full-bodied coffee with rich aroma. The blend is a combination of Arabica and Robusta both with different origins.

fields.name: Caffé De Roccis Qualita Oro Intenso Espresso beans
fields.description: This coffee blend confers creamy taste and delicate fragrance to your espresso. Gold Quality Italian coffee beans is the preferred solution for those who do not want to give up the magic of the complete preparation of espresso coffee.

fields.name: Segafredo Casa Espresso ground
fields.description: It’s a blend of the best qualities of Arabica and Robusta, selected to replicate at home the fragrance and consistency of the Espresso you can drink in a bar.

fields.name: Lavazza Top Class Gran Gusto
fields.description: A blend from a selection of sweet Asian coffees distinguished by their round taste, expertly blended with fragrant milds from the Central American highlands and mellow Brazilian coffees. 50% arabica and 50% robusta.

fields.name: Carraro Cubanita Gusto Classico beans
fields.description: Cubanita springs from the perfumes of the Tropics, a selection of the finest green Arabicas and Robustas for a coffee with a full and persistent flavour.

fields.name: Segafredo Selezione ORGANICA Espresso Beans
fields.description: Italian Caffè pleasure with a unique chocolate tone and a seductive caramel crema. The selected mix of Organic Arabica and Robusta from the finest cultivation areas of the world, refined by the original Venetian roasting process, guarantees a great taste experience.

fields.name: Lavazza Expert Gusto Pieno Espresso Beans
fields.description:
Espresso with an intense aroma and compact cream, further enhanced by the toasted notes of fine woods. Blend of full-bodied and aroma rich coffee typologies coming from the African, Asian and South American plantations.

20% Arabica and 80% Robusta.

Roasting: Medium.

Intensity scale (1-10): 9

fields.name: Lavazza Qualita Oro Ground Coffee in Can
fields.description: Lavazza Qualità Oro Ground Coffee: Qualità Oro was the first Lavazza blend, born in 1956 and handed down from father to son for over 60 years. A true connoisseur's coffee, for those who love to savour a fine blend every day. Qualità Oro is the symbol of Lavazza's ability to create exceptional coffee blends, every time. 250g pack of medium roast ground Lavazza coffee with a level 5 delicate intensity. Sweet and refined with notes of fruit and flowers. This ground coffee can be used with a moka pot, filtered coffee machine or a French press.

fields.name: Casatica di Bufala
fields.description:
It is so rare to find a cheese made from Buffala milk that’s not Mozzarella, so we’re delighted to have found this unique bloomy rind cheese from the masterful cheesemaking brothers Alfio and Bruno Gritti of Quatro Portoni, who specialize in transforming buffalo milk into exquisite cheeses (including Blue di Bufala, another fantastic offering).

The velvety Casatica di Bufala has that extra creaminess from bufala milk (it has double the cream content than cow’s milk). This buffalo milk cheese is made in a Stracchino style, shaped like a square, and aged for about 4-5 weeks. The pate is buttery and silky but holds its shape, with a flavor that’s milky, a slight tang and a sweet finish - very similar to Brie, but richer.

Pair Casatica di Bufala with a bubbly Prosecco or Champagne, grapes, sweet pears and a fresh baguette.

fields.name: Pecorino with Black Pepper
fields.description: Pasteurized Sheep's Milk, Enzymes, Rennet, Salt, Black Pepper.

fields.name: Bianco Sardo
fields.description:
Bianco Sardo is a unique sheep’s milk cheese similar in texture to other hard Italian cheeses like Parmigiano Reggiano or Pecorino Romano. However, understated Bianco Sardo has a noticeable tanginess but is not as salty as parm. It presents lovely notes of fresh grass and that beautiful oiliness that comes from sheep’s milk. This is a classic yet underrated Italian formaggio: crumbly and dry, but fatty and creamy on the palate.

The cheese is molded and aged in reed baskets, which gives the rind a beautiful imprint and which also gives it another name, Canestrato. It also imprints the flavor and aroma of the cheese, giving it herbaceous touches. Bianco Sardo comes from Sardinia, a gorgeous island in the equally gorgeous Mediterranean Sea. This sharp, full flavored cheese is made from the milk of sheep that graze in the Apulian fields.

Bianco Sardo cheese melts beautifully over a pizza or panini, and it is perfect to grate over pasta, instantly adding a sharp aroma and a flavor that’s nutty with notes of caramel.

fields.name: Parmigiano Reggiano
fields.description:
One of the most popular and emblematic Italian cheeses, Parmigiano Reggiano is a classic cheese around the world. Made from raw cow’s milk, this particular Parmigiano is aged for 24 months at least, developing that rich, salty-but-buttery, complex and full flavor that we love.

This dry, hard and crumbly cheese is made in the Emilia Romagna region of Italy. The cheese is left to age in cellars, turned every week and inspected at 12 months by the Consortium that oversees the production of Parmigiano, to make sure it’s up to par. This ancient cheese has been in production for over 800 years, and Italians take great pride and care of its production.

Typically shaved or grated and served over a heaping plate of pasta, a hot piping risotto, or slivered over salads, a great Parmigiano Reggiano is also traditionally eaten in Italy shaved and drizzled with an aged Balsamic vinegar. Save the rind once the cheese is gone and add it to your soups and stock for a fabulous flavor.

fields.name: Boschetto
fields.description:
Boschetto al Tartufo (pronounced bo-SKETT-oh) by Il Fortero is a creamy Italian cheese made from a blend of cow and sheep’s milk with shavings of the rare white truffle interspersed throughout.

At 1% white truffle by volume, this semi-soft cheese has a luxurious and sophisticated flavor that at once celebrates the rare white truffle, and uses it perfectly alongside creamy cow’s milk and pungent sheep’s milk; crafting an incredibly flavored cheese. Salty, earthy, rustic and fresh, the flavors of the white truffle are truly allowed to shine through in this cheese. The texture is smooth, soft yet firm, and melts in your mouth. Taste it alone on a cheese plate, melt it over toast, or blend it into a mild risotto. You aren’t going to want to over spice a dish with this white truffle cheese and run the risk of overwhelming its flavor.

Prepared in Mugello, Tuscany, by the Il Forteto Cooperative, this rindless artisanal cheese is aged 60 days or less. Recommended wine pairings include a Borolo, Pinot Grigio, or Riesling.

fields.name: Ricotta Salata
fields.description: Pasteurized Sheep's Milk, Enzymes, Salt.

fields.name: Pantaleo
fields.description:
Pantaleo is a unique and rare goat’s milk cheese coming from Sardinia. It is a wonderfully complex cheese bursting with flavors of herbs and hints of lemon and lime in its floral finish. It has a thin pale-yellow rind and ivory paste that emits a caramel-like scent, enticing you to indulge in this fine cheese.

Most cheeses that come from Sardinia are made using sheep’s milk. However, Pantaleo comes from Capra Sarda goats’ milk, making it a special cheese. It matures for no less than 100 days and follows a similar recipe to Fiore Sardo – a traditional sheep’s milk cheese from Sardinia.

The firm to dry texture of Pantaleo makes it perfect for grating and shaving over pastas, risottos and salads. Its unique flavors will enhance any dish or cheeseboard it is added to. Shave over warm vegetables to create an impressive side. We recommend you serve it alongside un-oaked Chardonnay or a dry sherry to complement its robust taste.

fields.name: Caciotta al Tartufo Truffled Cheese
fields.description:
So many truffle cheeses are just bland cheese creations masked in truffle oil or artificial truffle flavor. Not this one! Caciotta al Tartufo is a high-quality truffle cheese made with exceptional milk in the Roman countryside.

Producers load each batch with wonderful, high-quality black truffles and cow’s and sheep’s milk to create flavors beyond your wildest expectations. They age each wheel over 60 days, which creates delicate, tangy flavors that wash over in every bite.

This is certainly an exotic cheese made for those with a palate for the finer things in life. The final product comes out with a firm texture, but the paste is somewhat soft and mild. The truffles and milk have a real earthy aroma, but the age gives it a little pungency.

Use this flavorful cheese as part of your next cheese or charcuterie board. It stands on its own very well, but it works very well with fresh toasted baguette bread and extra-virgin olive oil. Because it is aged and has earthy notes, the Caciotta al Tartufo can be powerful. Pair it with a dry white wine or a strong red like Merlot.

Caciotta al Tartufo - Truffled Cheese by Mitica is another example of Mitica’s fantastic catalog of delicious imported foods. The company established itself as the premier importer of Mediterranean foods in 1988 and hasn’t let its customers down since. Their relationships with the top producers in Italy, Spain, Portugal, and Croatia provide their catalog with more and more tasty and original products each year.

They consistently site visit for quality control and developed their own Foreign Supplier Verification Program to provide lasting quality for all of their products every year. As part of Forever Foods, Mitica continues to source the best cheeses the international community offers.

fields.name: Verde Capra
fields.description: A unique and delicious goat’s milk blue cheese from Ca De Ambros. Aged only about 3 months, Verde Capra is less creamy than cow's milk blue cheeses, with a more distinct sourness and a lovely aroma.

fields.name: Piave Vecchio
fields.description:
Similar to a young Parmigiano, Piave Vecchio is one of those mainstays of Italian cheesemaking. Made from cow's milk that graze in the fertile plains of the Po Valley in the Veneto region of Italy, Piave Vecchio is aged for about 5 months, making it hard but not dry yet. The texture is hard and compact, with a wonderful flavor that combines the taste of nuts and caramel with sweet, almost fruity notes. Use this flavorful cheese on a cheese board paired with fruits and nuts, shaved over a green salad, or melted over polenta and risotto. Pair with a full-bodied red wine like Barolo.
Ingredients: Cow's milk, lactic enzymes, rennet, salt.

fields.name: Lou Bergier Pichin Cheese
fields.description:
Lou Bergier Pichin is a semi-soft Toma (round) cheese from Piedmont, Italy. It's made using raw milk from the Fiandino’s family purebred Bruno Alpino cows. It’s a unique mix of French and Italian traditions- the use of day-old whey is Italian, while the tomme shape is French. Lou Bergier has the aroma of mushrooms and barnyard; its flavors are bright: grass, milk, and citrus. It features a pale yellow, velvety paste inside its mottled brown rind.

These wonderful flavors develop as the cheese ages for 60 days, and also thanks to its unique production method, which Fattorie Fiandino has coined the “Kinara” method. The Kinara method relies on mountain thistle flowers as the rennet.

Wash down the incredible Lou Bergier Pichin cheese with crisp white wines or light fruity reds to enhance its flavors. Take advantage of its full-flavored creaminess and melt into a potato and thyme pie or a fresh pea soup. You can add a bit of variety to any cheese board with it and enjoy it with some salted crackers or sliced, toasted bread.

fields.name: ALPESTRE THE PURE MEDICINAL HERB AND PLANT DISTILLATE
fields.description:
ALPESTRE, the pure herb distillate has an ancient history. It was created in 1857 by Friar Emanuel a Marist priest to cure his sick brethren, in fact, to this day, it is still made with a secret recipe.

It has a pleasant and perfumed taste of herbs. It is an absolutely natural and precious distillate that is best appreciated by sipping it, in small doses, from a glass that will enhance its olfactory and aromatic qualities and infuse all the beneficial virtues of purely distilled fresh herbs. Alpestre is an excellent digestive. It can be drank straight after a good meal, even warmed and is magnificent in coffee. Thanks to its relaxing properties, we advise it be drank lying down with water and honey, like a herbal tea in the evening before going to bed.

fields.name: PADRE PEPPE - ELIXIR AMARO 42% VOL
fields.description:
Discover one of the oldest and most delicious Italian liquor - Padre Peppe. Padre Peppe is a walnut liquor made based on an ancient recipe. The dark-colored liquor is made with green walnut and natural flavor.

This liquor is dark in color, aged for 4-year in ancient oak barrels and has an aroma of fresh green walnuts and high gradation. It is sweet in the mouth and has bitter notes, and very persistent. The taste is unmistakable as it remains the same for over 200 years.

It can also be served hot as a punch due to the spices it contains; after all the benefits of walnuts and eastern spices have been known since ancient times, both as a mass remedy and in the medicine field. The taste of Padre Peppe is persistent, sweet ad bitter at the same time, just like memories.

fields.name: 'RUPES' CALABRIAN ELISIR DIGESTIVO - WORLD AWARDS GOLD 2020-2021
fields.description:
'Rupes' Calabrian Elisir Digestivo has its roots in the secular traditions of Calabria dating back to the Middle Ages, years in which bitter was used as a digestive remedy in monasteries. Today Rupes is projected to the future with a strong and refined taste, together with an unmistakable Mediterranean character. According to historical evidences, the name of the bitter derives from the place where it was distilled at the beginning of 1800, at the foot of Rupe di Rocella.

It is made using the old artisanal method of cold maceration of the thirty aromatic and medicinal herbs that make it up; among these are wild fennel, Calabrian liquorice and bay leaves.

fields.name: AMARU UNNIMAFFISSU - L'AMARO SICILIANO
fields.description:
Amaro Unnimaffissu is a digestive produced in Sicily, born from a selection of raw materials mixed with care. Among these we find orange peels, carobs and prickly pears which outline a delicate and original taste, perfect to take a pleasant break every time you want.

This amazing liquor expresses, in its complexity, bitter notes accompanied by the elegant softness of prickly pears, which makes it the most consumed liquor in Siciliy.

With Liquor Amaru Unnimaffissu - L'amaro Siciliano, your day or occasion can never go wrong. It is a liquor produced with organic peels of Orange, carobs and prickly pears, combined with other healthy herbs and spices.

Amaru Unnimaffissu - Sicilian amaro is better enjoyed both at room and fresh temperatures. The great thing about it is that it is perfect for all occasions.

fields.name: 'BERGAMOTTO FANTASTICO' AWARD-WINNING CALABRIAN APERITIVO
fields.description:
Produced with only fresh fruits peeled by hand, the award-winning Bergamotto Fantastico is tasty and enjoyable. It is infused for two months and filtered with linen cloths before being bottled. The scent of Bergamotto Fantastico is authentic and the taste is of the authentic Calabrese Bergamot.

Calabrese Bergamot is the king of citrus fruits, which is why Bergamotto Fantastico is produced with only organic and handpicked Calabrese bergamot. This is a real Italian product that delights your palate and calms you, no matter how you sip it.

If you love natural fruity liquor that is perfect for after-meal or any occasion, Bergamotto Fantastico is indisputably the best. Whether chilled or ordinarily, you will enjoy this limoncello colored liquor.

Bergamotto Fantastico is natural and also perfect as a gift for any occasion.

fields.name: 'ABRACADRABA' AUTHENTIC LIQUORICE LIQUEUR OF CALABRIA
fields.description:
There are some things that are born in a magical way. 

Giocondo at the Vecchio Magazzino Doganale bartered the first agricultural tools for liquorice roots. Today, luck has it that in our terrain of dreams, our “Martorano” botanical garden was full of liquorice (PDO). We could not overlook two such important elements, which inevitably have marked our history. With great difficulty we put together: research, recipe, history and image. We are proud to present our liquorice: «We were standing in line, we couldn’t wait to sit down, the lights were magical. The magician shouted: ABRACADABRA and the show began».

Abracadabra Liquore di Liquirizia migliore del Mondo. The Best Authentic PDO liquorice liqueur of Calabria. The ancestral method of boiling helps to pull the roots which are subsequently squeezed. Separately an alcohol infusion with roots reduced to chunks is prepared. Alcohol content and maturation time of the infusion may vary from time to time. The natural color, aroma and density of Abracadabra make it a unique liquorice liqueur.

fields.name: ROGER CALABRIAN BITTER AMARO EXTRA STRONG
fields.description:
Roger Calabrian Bitter Amaro Extra Strong is a bitter and digestive liquor produced from a combination of organic and handpicked Calabrian citrus fruits, including lemon, sweet and bitter oranges from Bisignano and Pellaro bergamot, alongside gentian, quassia, corinader and Carlina.

This liquor is filtered without any dye, but with linen towels. Roger Calabrian Bitter Amaro Extra Strong is a thoroughbred Amaro with natural coloring and masculine character that makes it a perfect digestive and mix product.

This warm and intense liquor is citrusy, slightly sweet, spicy and bitterish. You can sip it straight for a strong flavor or mix it with other ingredients. Roger Calabrian Bitter Amaro Extra Strong is perfect for any occasion because it is tasty and digestive.

Roger Calabrian Bitter Amaro Extra Strong is a perfect gift for any purpose and if you don't have it in your bar, you are missing out on a classic liquor.

fields.name: LIQUOR JEFFERSON AMARO CALABRESE
fields.description:
Liquor Jefferson Amaro Calabrese is a bitter liquor with a characteristic Calabrian citrus scent. This amazing liquor expresses, in its complexity, bitter notes accompanied by the elegant softness of vanilla, which makes it the most consumed liquor around the world.

With Liquor Jefferson Amaro Calabrese, your day or occasion can never go wrong. It is a liquor produced with organic bergamot, bitter and sweet oranges, oregano and rosemary, combined with other healthy herbs and spices.

Liquor Jefferson Amaro Calabrese is better enjoyed both at room and fresh temperatures. The great thing about it is that it is perfect for all occasions. Whenever you are thirsty for liquor with class, grab a glass of Liquor Jefferson Amaro Calabrese and sip with swag.

fields.name: TUSCANY ALCHERMES LIQUEUR
fields.description:
Its bright, ruby red color, which gave it its name, and the warm, spicy taste make Alkermes a unique liqueur!

Alchermes is a classic Italian liqueur, full-bodied, rich in spicy aromas and with hints of citrus. It has been used for centuries for the preparation of homemade desserts. During the Renaissance, it was the favorite liqueur at the Medici’s house in Florence.

The production of alchermes liqueur in Italy can easily be traced to Florence. It is credited to the Frati di Santa Maria Novella in the 1400s, although note the spelling on the label of the bottle in our image above.

The liqueur was very popular during the rule of the Medici who enjoyed its flavour in many sweet dishes of the period. It was known as the 'elisir di lunga vita' and was also introduced in France by Caterina de' Medici. So, alchermes became known as the 'liquore de' Medici' or liqueur of the Medici.

fields.name: PADRE PEPPE - WONDERFUL WALNUT CREAM ELIXIR 50 CL
fields.description:
Cream color, excellent and brilliant, Padre Peppe Cream Elixir is a delicious liquor with a classic aroma of green walnut. The liquor has 42% alcoholic content and is well known for its digestive effects. If you love it creamy, this digestive liquor is for you.

Padre Peppe is perfect for consumption at any time and with its excellent taste and great flavor, you can immerse your palate in maximum enjoyment. Whether hot or at room temperature or with ice, the flavor and taste of this classic liquor is uncompromisable. It is persistent, sweet and bitter at the same time.

It is also a perfect gift for any occasion and can be consumed anywhere easily. 

HOW TO SERVE PADRE PEPPE CREAM
It can be consumed alone, hot, or at room temperature, or with ice. You can add it to your ice cream or coffee.

fields.name: ITALIAN TIRAMISÙ EXQUISITE LIQUEUR
fields.description: This liqueur is an exquisite specialty produced using an original formula by Giuseppe Marcati. Coffee, Vanilla, Cocoa are the main ingredients that give the liqueur a full and unmistakable taste, perfect for the preparation of the “Tiramisu” cake and of excellent cocktails.

fields.name: AMARO AVERNA - DON SALVATORE RESERVE
fields.description:
Averna - the authentic Italian after-dinner amaro is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the launch of the first ever aged edition, Averna Riserva Don Salvatore.

The ancient Averna recipe is aged in small selected oak casks for 18 months, producing a mature liquid and rich Mediterranean bouquet inspired by Don Salvatore Averna,

who received the secret recipe as a gift from Frà Girolamo, a Benedictine monk of Caltanissetta, Sicily, 150 years ago.

fields.name: 'PUCCINI' SICILIAN MANDARIN APERITIVO SICILIANO
fields.description:
A classic aperitif, its inebriating Sicilian mandarin fragrance is best enjoyed quite cool, even slightly chilled. Ideally, do not store the bottle too long, in order to enjoy its peachy freshness to the full. Puccini is an aperitif composed of two parts sparkling wine and one part mandarin juice from the consortium Tardivo di Ciaculli, which owes its name to the village of Palermo where it was discovered and the period of ripening, later than the most common varieties.
The strong aroma, the sugar content, the thin skin, and the presence of the seed make Sicilian Tardivo di Ciaculli, a Slow Food Presidium, a unique and unmistakable mandarin.
It is a fresh, light and very fragrant aperitif to be enjoyed very cold and possibly with ice.

Serving Temperature: 6-8° C (c. 43-46° F)
Alcohol Cont.: 5% by vol.

fields.name: 'RAVELLO' MEMORITALY LIMONCELLO FROM AMALFI COAST
fields.description:
'Ravello' Memoritaly Limoncello from Amalfi Coast is a vibrant, intense and undiluted Limoncello that provides a great taste that tickles your palate. It is rich in original lemon color while its intense flavors and alcohol content makes it a full-to-heavy bodied. Once you see the bottle, you will immediately notice the yellow color of the lemon from Amalfi Coast.

'Ravello' Limoncello from Amalfi Coast is a wonderful and bright lemon drink that provides you a sparkling fresh, invigorating taste. The lemon from Sorrento comes in a stylish bottle that makes it the best gift you can give to anyone. If you have never tasted Limoncello of Sorrento, but want to experience the natural citrus first hand, Amalfitano Limoncello is your best bet.

500 ml/16.9 fl.oz

fields.name: 'LEMON' DOLCETERRA LIMONCELLO OF SORRENTO JAR
fields.description:
Most times served after meals, 'LEMON' Dolceterra Limoncello of Sorrento Jar is like a kiss from the sun. Italy is known for producing a delicious and natural lemon. Whenever people talk about Amalfi Coast, they can’t but mentioning the lemon trees being grown in abundance in this area.

'LEMON' Dolceterra Limoncello of Sorrento Jar is particularly sweet that locals even eat a thick slice of the fruit. If you have not topped your meal with lemon, your meal is not complete. When you take lemon after a meal, it will soothe your stomach.

Not only is Italian Limoncello of Sorento the best drink, but the jar is also beautiful. The jar is designed and crafted in ceramics by Vietri artists to exalt tradition and guarantee the highest quality standards to our first class Limoncello drink.

fields.name: AMARO BRAULIO CLASSICO
fields.description:
The legendary liqueur Amaro Braulio with the magical flavour of the original 1875 recipe.

Made of herbs including musk yarrow, wormwood, gentian and juniper, Bràulio is rested in Slavonian oak casks. This process, combined with an alcohol content of 21° and the use of exclusively natural ingredients, gives Bràulio its unmistakable balanced flavour and aromatic bouquet.

Bràulio is still made in the Valtellina, in the cellars of Bormio, using the traditional secret recipe which involves a period of resting in Slavonian oak casks.

fields.name: LIMONCELLO DI SORRENTO GIOIA LUISA
fields.description:
Limoncello di Sorrento GIOLA LUISA is a liqueur made with the infusion of Amalfi Lemon Peel.

It is a delicate liqueur with an amazing lemon scent which completely expresses fragrance that is typical of the fruit and freshness. GIOLA LUISA is the original Limoncello from Sorrento and only made using exclusively private local orchards.

Its ingredients are first class and its perfect cooking and maceration give it a great taste. The creamy and soft taste, as well as its slightly sweet taste, makes it a delicacy. Its rich, smooth lingering flavor and bright fruit taste promise to deliver great taste.

fields.name: CREAM LIMONCELLO CAPRI - PISTACHIO
fields.description:
Cream Limoncello Capri Pistachio is the perfect Limoncello for any occasion. Discover the real story of Amalfi Coast and the island of Capri. This is a great creamy liquor that brings the delicacy of cream and milk together while being spiced up with the great aroma of Pistachio and Limoncello of Sorrento.

Whether it is for a party or home refreshment, Cream Limoncello Capri Pistachio delivers a great taste that tickles the palate. If you are looking for a special creamy drink that combines Amalfi Coast lemon flavor and Italian tradition, Cream Limoncello Capri – Pistachio is the best choice.

You don’t need to be in Italy to immerse yourself in the beauty of Italian tradition, culture and the great flavor of Limoncello of Sorrento; Cream Limoncello Capri – Pistachio brings everything that has to do with Italian Lemon drink to your doorstep. Grab a bottle of this wonderful and delicate liquor cream of Limoncello Pistachio and make your day a blissful one.

fields.name: MARCATI - LE FARFALLE
fields.description: Prodotto con vinacce da uve selezionate e Vienne successivamente invecchiato per 18 mesi in Oltre botti di rovere. La Grappa ottenuta E liscia e aromatico, con sentori di vaniglia e frutta rossa.

fields.name: ITALIAN APERITIF APEROL
fields.description: The name says it all: Aperol is the perfect aperitif. Bright orange in colour, it has a unique taste, thanks to the secret recipe, which has never been changed, with infusions of selected ingredients including bitter and sweet oranges and many other herbs (including rhubarb) and roots in perfect proportions.

fields.name: Classic Amaretti Cookies
fields.description:
The exquisite Classic Amaretti Cookies from Marabissi are sweet and soft hand-shaped almond cookies with a wonderful consistency and delicate flavor. After the first bite, you will notice the aftertaste and grainy texture of raw almonds.

These amaretti are wonderful with your morning coffee, or as a treat right after dinner with a glass of sweet Italian wine.

The history of Marabissi began almost a century ago when the Marabissi family opened their first bakery in the Tuscan city of Siena, baking cantucci according to Signora Jole Marabissi's recipe. Their family-owned bakery continues to promote a culture of learning and collaboration. Each day there are new opportunities for their dedicated employees to learn and develop, both as individuals and as an organization. Because of this, Marabissi has become a name associated with some of Italy's most iconic and high-quality treats, from cookies to cakes!

fields.name: Gran Pasticceria: Coconut
fields.description:
Loacker presents Gran Pasticceria: Coconut, a heavenly snack made of coconut cream between deliciously thin wafers, wrapped in the finest milk chocolate and sprinkled liberally with fresh coconut flakes.

Enjoy a taste of paradise with every bite.

In 1925, Alfons Loacker, a trained confectioner from Austria, opened his small pastry shop in Bolzano, in the heart of the Italian Dolomites, in the Trentino Alto Adige region. Due to his love for nature and enthusiasm for baking, he started to create wafer specialties made from natural raw materials. With the expertise of three generations of a family-run business, teams of employees select only high-quality ingredients: the finest Italian hazelnuts, freshly roasted by Loacker, Bourbon vanilla pods, aromatic cocoa, the highest quality milk from the Alps, and fresh mountain water. Today, Loacker Chocolates and Wafers are famous around the world and enjoyed by kids and adults.

fields.name: Gran Pasticceria: Dark-Chocolate Hazelnut
fields.description:
The Gran Pasticceria: Dark-Chocolate Hazelnut is a snack with an intense, bittersweet flavor of the finest extra-dark chocolate and delicious roasted hazelnut, impossibly thin, crispy wafers – all covered in rich, velvety dark chocolate cream.

Share this darkly seductive confection with someone you love.

In 1925, Alfons Loacker, a trained confectioner from Austria, opened his small pastry shop in Bolzano, in the heart of the Italian Dolomites, in the Trentino Alto Adige region. Due to his love for nature and enthusiasm for baking, he started to create wafer specialties made from natural raw materials. With the expertise of three generations of a family-run business, teams of employees select only high-quality ingredients: the finest Italian hazelnuts, freshly roasted by Loacker, Bourbon vanilla pods, aromatic cocoa, the highest quality milk from the Alps, and fresh mountain water. Today, Loacker Chocolates and Wafers are famous around the world and enjoyed by kids and adults.

fields.name: Toscano Brown - Milk Chocolate Bar
fields.description:
The Toscano Brown - Milk Chocolate Bar by Amedei Tuscany is a milk chocolate bar made with a minimum of 32% cacao and a blend of different kinds of milk. Sweet and creamy at the first bite, this chocolate bar has hints of butter, white flowers, and vanilla, with a surprisingly pleasant sapidity.

Enjoy this bar as a special snack, or after dinner with a glass of red wine.

Amedei Tuscany was founded in 1990 by Cecilia Tessieri, the world's first female master chocolatier, who, thanks to her constant search for innovative manufacturing techniques, high-quality ingredients, and exciting flavor profiles, turned Amedei Tuscany into a staple of Italian chocolate production. Today, Amedei Tuscany is one of the world's premier luxury chocolate makers, and a six-time winner of the Academy of Chocolate's "Gold Bean" Award. Elegance, craftsmanship, and simplicity, are the keywords in understanding Amedei Tuscany's chocolate, a product inspired by the beauty of Italian culture, and the magic of the Tuscan region.

fields.name: Toscano White - White Chocolate Bar
fields.description:
The Toscano White - White Chocolate Bar by Amedei Tuscany is a white chocolate bar with a pure and harmonious flavor. Creamy and delicate at the first bite, this chocolate bar is characterized by elegant hints of honey, vanilla, and fresh milk.

Enjoy this bar as a special snack, or after a meal with a glass of red wine.

Amedei Tuscany was founded in 1990 by Cecilia Tessieri, the world's first female master chocolatier, who, thanks to her constant search for innovative manufacturing techniques, high-quality ingredients, and exciting flavor profiles, turned Amedei Tuscany into a staple of Italian chocolate production. Today, Amedei Tuscany is one of the world's premier luxury chocolate makers, and a six-time winner of the Academy of Chocolate's "Gold Bean" Award. Elegance, craftsmanship, and simplicity, are the keywords in understanding Amedei Tuscany's chocolate, a product inspired by the beauty of Italian culture, and the magic of the Tuscan region.

fields.name: Porcelana - 70% Dark Chocolate Bar
fields.description:
The Porcelana - 70% Dark Chocolate Bar by Amedei Tuscany is a 70% dark chocolate bar named Porcelana, or porcelain, as it is made exclusively with the white, delicate, and precious, Criollo cacao beans, which are produced in limited quantities every year. Creamy and delicate at the first bite, this chocolate bar has a strong, dark, finish with hints of toasted almonds and bay leaf.

Enjoy this bar as a special snack, or in combination with creamy cheeses, sweets, and a glass of red wine.

Amedei Tuscany was founded in 1990 by Cecilia Tessieri, the world's first female master chocolatier, who, thanks to her constant search for innovative manufacturing techniques, high-quality ingredients, and exciting flavor profiles, turned Amedei Tuscany into a staple of Italian chocolate production. Today, Amedei Tuscany is one of the world's premier luxury chocolate makers, and a six-time winner of the Academy of Chocolate's "Gold Bean" Award. Elegance, craftsmanship, and simplicity, are the keywords in understanding Amedei Tuscany's chocolate, a product inspired by the beauty of Italian culture, and the magic of the Tuscan region.

fields.name: Hazelnut Cantucci Cookies
fields.description:
Thought to have been present in Italian cooking since the 16th century, cantucci are a type of twice-baked biscotti typical of Toscana. For the Hazelnut Cantucci Cookies variety, Marabissi has enriched the original recipe with decadent, high-quality hazelnuts.

These crunchy cookies are delicious on their own or dipped in your favorite beverage, from cappuccino to dessert wine.

The history of Marabissi began almost a century ago with Tuscan cantucci, baked following Signora Jole's own recipe. Three generations later, Marabissi is still known as the very best in the region's cookies and cakes.

fields.name: Orange and Dark Chocolate Panettone
fields.description:
Classic, soft, and fragant the Orange and Dark Chocolate Panettone from Vincente is a typical Italian holiday dough filled almonds, raisins, candied oranges, and chocolate.

Excellent on its own, this panettone pairs well with fresh berries, whipped cream, and dark chocolate. Enjoy the holiday cake with a cup of coffee for an afternoon pick-me-up, or serve as an after-dinner dessert with a glass of wine (we recommend Serafini & Vidotto Bollicine Di Rosé).

Vincente is a family-run artisan business located in the heart of Bronte, a Sicilian town famous for pistachios. They employ traditional baking methods paying particular attention to 'starter yeast,' which allows panettone to rise for hours in order to achieve softness and fragance.

fields.name: Butter Torcetti Pastries
fields.description:
The Butter Torcetti Pastries are delicious pastries that taste just like home-made treats! Made with only a few, high-quality, and simple ingredients such as butter and sugar, these treats are perfect for breakfast with a cup of coffee or tea, or a mid-day snack.


De Mori was started in 1974 by Doriano De Mori, who began baking and selling hand-made bread to local shops around his town. In 2001, with his son Simone, he began expanding his production to include other baked goods such as breadsticks and pastries.

fields.name: Minivoglie Cookie Assortment
fields.description:
Using the finest natural ingredients, Vicenzi still creates its confections from the original recipes developed by Matilde Vicenzi in her kitchen in Italy.

Packaged in a delightful tin, the Minivoglie cookies are an assortment of some of the most beloved cookies by Vicenzi, from chocolate cream to shortbread.

For a traditional Italian breakfast, dunk a cookie in your morning coffee. They are also perfect for any afternoon pick-me-up.

fields.name: Eataly Mint Candies
fields.description: Careful selection of plant essences, extracts and the use of various herbs enhance the refreshing fruit and herbal fragrances bursting out of this petite Leone for Eataly Pastilles tin.

fields.name: Walnut and Fig Panforte
fields.description:
This walnut and fig panforte is a modern twist on the typical Tuscan cake, filled with Calabrese sundried figs and luscious Italian walnuts.

A beloved dessert, panforte is wonderful paired with a wide variety of cheeses.

The history of Marabissi began almost a century ago with Tuscan cantucci, baked following Signora Jole's own recipe. Three generations later, Marabissi is still known as the very best in the region’s cookies and cakes.

fields.name: Tiramisù Quadratini
fields.description:
Loacker’s light, crispy bite-sized Tiramisù Quadratini are made with light, crispy bite-sized wafers that embrace luscious layers of tiramisù cream.

For a delicious snack at any time, enjoy this mouth-watering morsel wherever you are.

In 1925 Alfons Loacker, a trained confectioner from Austria, opened his small pastry shop in Bolzano, in the heart of the Italian Dolomites, in the Trentino Alto Adige region. Due to his love for nature and enthusiasm for baking, he started to create wafer specialties made from natural raw materials. With the expertise of three generations of a family-run business, teams of employees select only high-quality ingredients: the finest Italian hazelnuts, freshly roasted by Loacker, Bourbon vanilla pods, aromatic cocoa, the highest quality milk from the Alps, and fresh mountain water. Today, Loacker Chocolate and Wafers are famous around the world and enjoyed by kids and adults.

fields.name: Novara Cookies
fields.description: Since 1852, the Camporelli family has been baking these cookies in Novara in the northwestern region of Piemonte. Similar to ladyfingers, they are a key ingredient in Eataly's housemade tiramisu.

fields.name: Dark Chocolate Truffles
fields.description:
The Trifulot Dark Chocolate Truffles from Tartuflanghe is a sweet chocolate truffle made with the finest dark chocolate and Piemontese IGP hazelnuts. "Trifulot" in Piemontese dialect means "tiny truffle."

Enjoy as dessert for a sweet taste of Italy, or give as a unique gift.

TartufLanghe was founded by Domenica Bertolusso and Beppe Montanaro in 1980 in the Langhe area. TartufLanghe was the first company to produce dry products with truffles to give people the opportunity to enjoy truffle when not in season. Thanks to this innovation, in 1990 the first pasta with truffle in the world was created in the TartufLanghe laboratory: Tartufissima. In 1992 Tartufissima pasta was awarded as the best new product of the year at the Summer Fancy Food Show in New York. Now, the next generation, Stefania and Paolo, are bringing new ideas to the prestigious family tradition.

fields.name: Crunchy Amaretti Cookies in Tower Tin
fields.description:
The Crunchy Amaretti Cookies in Tower Tin from Chiostro di Saronno are individually wrapped cookies made with only a few, high-quality ingredients, following the traditional recipe from Saronno, in Lombardia, containing apricot’s kernels, sugar, and egg whites.

Packaged in a tower tin, this cookie is the perfect match for a sweet glass of wine, or it can be enjoyed as a crispy snack after a meal.

Amaretti di Saronno, from the Italian word amaro meaning bitter, is a crunchy cookie that, according to legend, was first prepared by a young couple in 1718 as a gift for the Cardinal of Milano who was visiting the city of Saronno, in Lombardia. It was thanks to the Lazzaroni family, however, that the company Chiostro di Saronno was able to popularize the consumption of amaretti worldwide. Today, Chiostro di Saronno is still dedicated to producing high-quality sweets and liquors representative of the region Lombardia.

fields.name: Belle Buone Muesli and Fruit Rusks
fields.description:
The Belle Buone line by Galbusera combines all the goodness of a rustic dough from semi-refined flours, delicious fruits, and nutritious seeds, to create snacks that are not only flavorful but also good for you!

These Belle Buone Muesli and Fruit Rusks are delicious rusks made with wheat and oat flours, fruits, pecan, and seeds.

Try this irresistible snack in the morning for breakfast, or as an afternoon pick-me-up.

Founded in 1938 as a small pastry shop in the Valtellina Valley in the Alps, Galbusera is now one of the most established cookies and crackers brands in Italy. Using only high-quality ingredients, Galbusera is committed to offering delicious products that promote the health of its consumers and the preservation of the environment.

fields.name: Almond and Pistachio Biscotti di Prato Cookies
fields.description:
The Almond and Pistachio Biscotti di Prato are still baked in the same laboratory and 13th-century family building where Antonio Mattei first created them. Each batch is packed in its signature blue bag, which is closed and hand-tied individually. Enjoy the Biscotti di Prato with your morning coffee or as a snack with an afternoon tea.


In 1858 Antonio Mattei baked his first Biscotti di Prato, which would soon become a staple of the Italian biscotti or cookies, tradition. For more than a century and a half, the Biscottificio (cookies factory) has been run by the Mattei family, gaining national and international fame, and solidifying as one of the landmarks of the city of Prato, in Tuscany.

fields.name: Apricot Mezzaluna Breakfast Pastries
fields.description:
Soft, sweet, and delicious, these Apricot Mezzaluna pastries are made from all-natural ingredients with a 12-hour risen dough and filled with rich apricot jam. Perfect for any fruit lover, the tasty jam is so intense it will almost feel like eating an apricot itself.

Perfect for a sweet start to the day, or an afternoon merenda, an Italian snack!

Known for their high-quality bread, pastries, and confectionary specialties, Fraccaro Spumadora has been producing fragrant focaccia, panettone, and other traditional Italian sweets in the town of Castelfranco Veneto since 1932.

fields.name: Nocciolotta Ballotin
fields.description:
The Nocciolotta Ballotin from Caffarel are creamy gianduia pralines made of a blend of the Tonda Gentile Piemontese hazelnut, premium chocolate and milk. The resulting nocciolotta yields a delicate flavor and remarkably creamy texture.

Enjoy this nocciolotta whenever you need a sweet moment to yourself!

Caffarel has been making chocolate since 1826 in a small town in the foothills of Torino, the birthplace of the confectionery founder Pier Paul Caffarel. Pier Paul is known as the first to prepare gianduja, a decadent chocolate hazelnut pairing.

fields.name: Otello
fields.description:
The history of Marcato started in 1930 with the intuition of Otello Marcato, who created the first manual pasta machine to make it easier to prepare fresh homemade pasta.

Otello is the limited-edition machine that celebrates the original project of the company founder, reinterpreting the brand’s traditional design with modern technologies, quality materials and exclusive finishes.

fields.name: Marcato Atlas 150
fields.description:
Marcato’s Original World-Famous Atlas 150 pasta machine rolls and cuts pasta dough for traditional lasagna, fettuccine, and tag at home
Made in Italy from chrome-plated steel; Includes pasta machine, pasta cutter, hand crank, clamp, Instructions; 10-year
Rolls sheets of dough to 150-millimeters wide at 10 thicknesses (0. 6 to 4. 8-Millimeter) for consistent texture, cook time, and taste.Atlas 150 is not dishwasher safe
Easily attach the pasta drive motor and any of the 12 pasta cutting accessories (sold separately)
Called the Ferrari of the pasta machine world by Cook's illustrated; wipe with a Dry brush or cloth; Available exclusively from HIC Harold Import Co
Material Type: Nickel-Plated Steel, Chrome-Plated Steel, ABS

fields.name: Fante's Great Aunt Gina's Pasta Machine
fields.description:
Make delicious, traditional homemade pasta in as little as 20 minutes with Fante's Great Aunt Gina's Pasta Machine.

9 thickness settings from 0.5 mm to 3 mm. 5.5 in. wide rollers.
Includes double-cutter attachment for spaghetti and fettuccine.
Extra-wide clamp fits countertops from 1 to 2.4 in. thick.
Chromed steel body.
Includes family recipes for Pasta, Lasagna, Salsa Marinara, Meatballs, and Braciole.

Pasta Maker Maintenance:

Keep all pasta makers away from water to keep steel parts and wires from rusting.
Wipe off flour with a pastry brush.
Use a plastic scraper to remove any sticking dough.
Lubricate from time to time, depending on the humidity in your environment; place a drop of mineral oil where each roller meets the body. Store in the original box, in a dry place.

fields.name: Imperia Titania Pasta Machine
fields.description:
The Imperia Titania chrome-plated-steel pasta machine is precision engineered in Italy, sturdy and built to last.

The sleek Titania pasta machine produces a 5.9" / 150mm wide leaf, with settings for 6 thicknesses, and cutters for 2mm (tagliatelle) or 6.5mm (fettuccine) pasta.

Can be used with the Imperia PastaFacile motor.

CE Listed

fields.name: Marcato Atlas 180 Pasta Machine
fields.description:
Atlas 180, from the Marcato Classic line, is the home-made pasta machine equipped with wider rollers to prepare a wider sheet of pasta. The Atlas is a genuine Italian masterpiece entirely made in Italy.

The Atlas lets you prepare 3 pasta shapes: lasagne, fettuccine (6 mm) and tagliolini (1.5 mm).
Additional cutters are not yet available for the 180.
The machine can be used with the Pastadrive motor (sold separately) with its patented bayonet fitting, making your work easier.

10-position regulating knob for dough sheet thicknesses from 4.8 mm in position 0, to 0.6 mm in position 9.
Includes a clamp to secure the pasta machine to your work surface.
Includes a chromed steel crank handle with color ABS grip.
This machine is built with anodised aluminium alloy so that no metal residues are released onto the dough.
6-7/8 in. wide rollers and cutters.
Case-hardened tempered steel gears.
Resin-coated cutter 'combs.'

5 year limited warranty for home use.
Important: Do not use in the dishwasher nor clean with metal objects. Clean with a toothpick or a small brush.
Instructions for use and basic recipe included.

fields.name: Small Pasta Dough Sheeter
fields.description: Unique pasta machine for small restaurants or limited-use in larger restaurants and hotels. Engineered and produced by Italy's leading tabletop pasta machine manufacturer, this unit is used primarily in Italian homes for daily production of fresh pasta. Fettuccini and tagliatelle cutters are built into the machine. Cutters and the rollers are made of stainless steel. Other parts are enameled (xylan) steel and plastic.

fields.name: Tantelli pasta maker
fields.description:
The small  pasta machine designed for home users, small and beautiful environmental security, Reliable performance, feature-rich, multi-file adjustment. Just a few minutes at home can easily produce a variety of pasta, such as Wrapper,lasagne, Vermicelli, disc, Neat shape, uniform thickness, is a good helper in modern families, 

Thickness adjustable 0.3-3mm, The machine is made of stainless steel 430 shell, plus carbon steel Seiko plating, Clean and sanitary, easy to operate, can suppress a variety of pasta, The pasta made with this machine are as smooth and supple as the hand-rolled noodles.

fields.name: Marcato Pasta Fresca
fields.description: For the pasta-making amateur, the Marcato Pasta Fresca takes all of the guesswork out of the entire process. The Pasta Fresca machine has a built-in mixer that automatically kneads your dough and comes with three attachments for making lasagna, fettucine, and tagliolini. The manual includes all the instructions you need for a quick and easy pasta night and also features recipes for bread, cookies, and pizza!

fields.name: Razorri Comodo Electric Pasta Maker
fields.description: Another electronic extruder, the Razorri Pasta Maker is an ultra-intuitive machine that comes with an impressive 13 different dies for literally every type of pasta imaginable. Also included with the machine is a recipe book that features a variety of pasta dishes that span the globe. If you’re in the mood for Chinese lo mein, vegetable-infused fettuccine, Japanese ramen, Korean cold noodles, or just spaghetti and meatballs, Razorri has you covered.

fields.name: Oxgord Pastamaker
fields.description:
If you aren't ready to invest in a pricey pasta maker, we recommend the budget-friendly OxGord pasta maker as it packs plenty of value. It's affordable, easy to use, and simple to clean, making it a great entry point for homemade pasta.

Made from stainless steel, this manual machine comes with three roller and blade attachments that let you create flat sheets of pasta in nine different thicknesses, as well as fettuccine and spaghetti. The wooden handle can be removed for easier storage. While the base features pre-drilled holes for clamping it to a work surface, the included clamp doesn’t fit around some countertops and our product tester found the machine a little wobbly during use. Our reviewer, in her tests, found that the fettuccine and linguine cutters produced neatly cut strips, though she noted that some of the strands of spaghetti stuck together.

Like the other stainless-steel pasta makers on this list, the machine and attachments aren’t dishwasher safe: For cleanup, you’ll need to let any adhered dough dry out before brushing it away.

fields.name: Elektra Nivola Coffee Machine Redrace For Powder
fields.description: NIVOLA COFFEE CUP ELEKTRA ESPRESSO Elektra Nivola Red Race for powder Speed, the bright gleam of metal, streamlined forms that offer little resistance to the wind were the signs of modernity in the thirties. The creativity which generated the streamlined design of Nivola® incorporates the artistic and cultural influence of currents of thought that from futurism led to italian "Bolidism". An American movement in particular used them to revolitionize the way of designing everyday objects and machines: it was called Streamlining and had the merit of not only making the shapes of many industrial product more aesthetic and pleasing, but also inaugurated a new relationship between machine and man. It was the start of attention being paid to ease of use and practicality; in one world - ergonomics. Materials selected for their qualities of strength and durability, always in line with the quality level of the design: these are the finishing touch for a refined, sophisticated design. The Nivola® housing is in mirror-finish polished aluminium complete with a Plexiglass cup-covering dome. The grids are in non-corrosive stainless steel, the boiler unit and the filter holder are in brass, while the filter holder grip is in authentic Bakelite. Nivola® is a machine that has been designed to produce an excellent quality coffee at all times, even without any particular experience. A special technology makes it foolproof. If, for example, the water is not hot enough to prepare a good coffee or the steam pressure of the cappuccino maker is not yet at optimum temperature and pressure level, Nivola® goes into the stand-by stage. It only starts operating, a few seconds later, when ideal conditions have been reached. If there is no water in the tank, a warning is given before any damage can be caused. In this case Nivola® stops all functions until the tank is filled.

fields.name: LA PAVONI Europiccola Chrome
fields.description:
EN Europiccola Europiccola: the lever machine always in vogue. The machine is largely constructed of cast brass and is built to last. The large boiler ensures that lime scale deposits have minimal effect, meaning minimum maintenance is needed. By lifting the lever, a piston inside the group is raised, allowing water under pressure to infuse the coffee in the filter holder. The lever is then lowered, causing the piston to force the water through the coffee into the cup. The user therefore can vary the speed at which the water passes through the coffee, ensuring this latter is made exactly according to his own requirements. The machine is fitted with a steam jet interchangeable with the Automatic Cappuccino maker, for the preparation of cappuccino and hot drinks in general. The "Cappuccino Automatic" attachment ensures a perfect cappuccino every time. This device on the opening of a valve automatically sucks the milk from its container and brews it warm and perfectly frothed into the cup.

The Cappuccino Automatic is the optional. Model Europiccola allows 8 cups of espresso to be made consecutively. Boiler and group in chromed brass, owen-painted base, metal black colour, safety valve, steam jet. Sight glass. Handles: lever, filter holder, boiler cap, steam knob in ABS plastic. Drip tray and grill for cups in ABS plastic.

fields.name: Saeco Lirika
fields.description:
Fully-automatic espresso and cappuccino machine from Italy
Equipped with a user-friendly, intuitive professional interface and user a traffic-light color code system.
Pre-brewing system injects hot water in ground coffee to maximize flavor extraction
Steam wand / hot water wand, used to manually froth milk for cappuccino and latte or to dispense hot water.
Height adjustable spout.
Adjustable built-in flat grinder with automatic shut-off; safe, quiet and long lasting.
Easy clean system, easily removable brew group and drip tray for chemical-free cleaning.

fields.name: Jura ENA Micro 5 Aroma+
fields.description:
ENA Micro 5 AROMA+

Double Action 
 
JURA has a world first: the flow of the smartest of all time coffee. 
Simply select the "one" or "two cups" position and touch the touch panel of the ENA Micro 5 
for one or two perfect coffee specialties.

fields.name: New Rancilio Rocky Doser
fields.description:
The New Rancilio Rocky is the most durable coffee bean grinder available in its price range. It is extremely well made and we highly recommend it for home use and light commercial use. It is a dosing grinder, which makes it especially suited for use with an espresso machine. Although, it would have no problem grinding fine or coarse enough for any type of coffee/espresso machine you might have. The forks that are designed to hold your espresso machine portafilter in place are removable so that you may use any receptacle you want to catch the coffee. The Rocky is the grinder of choice for the finicky home barista due to its quality of grind and durability. Please note that most grinders are tested at the manufacturer and coffee grounds may be found in the grinder as a result. All machines sold are new unless otherwise clearly stated. 
This stainless steel version has a stainless steel back panel and base with a heavy-duty black case aluminum frame. This commercial-quality construction is durable and designed to match your other Rancilio products.
The Rocky can be quickly and accurately adjusted using its 55 different grind settings. To make the adjustment you just push down on a release lever and turn the bean hopper. You can quickly and easily change from course to fine. It can grind your beans into a fine powder for Turkish coffee or espresso and even course enough for French press. With a Rocky the most particular barista will be able to fine-tune their extractions to perfection.

fields.name: SANTOS ESPRESSO COFFEE MACHINE 75
fields.description:
DESCRIPTION

This 1 group coffee machine is a counter-top machine for bars, restaurants, offices, meeting rooms, to make high quality espresso.

It is designed for an easy use and cleaning with high quality materials.
The boiler gives a perfectly regulated temperature of water, to make the real creamy espresso.
Boiler has 2 sensors controlling separately water and steam temperatures.
Steam tube: hot water and steam for tea, cappucino, chocolate.
2.4l water tank. Can also be used with a bottle of water (1.5L).
Delivered with one filter holder and 3 filters : 1 cup and 2 cups, using ground coffee, and 1 cup for a standard pod.

fields.name: GRANGAGGIA STYLE - - RI8423/11
fields.description:
Compact design and professional performance - With the new Crema Perfetta filter holder. Gran Gaggia offers the passion of traditional Espresso preparation in a compact stainless steel design for a perfect Italian Espresso. The new Crema Perfetta pressurized filter holder guarantees a long lasting delicious Crema - everytime.

CUP WARMER
Your Gaggia Espresso machine has an energy-efficient integrated heating element to provide pre-warmed coffee cups. Pre-warming a cup will ensure your Espresso stays hot for longer.

PERFECT PRESSURE
The 15bar pressure of your Gaggia coffee machine will make sure you always get the authentic Espresso taste.

CLASSIC MILK FROTHER
The classic milk frother on this Gaggia Espresso machine, traditionally called "Panarello", turns milk into gorgeous milk froth within seconds for a Cappuccino, a Latte Macchiato or more. It also delivers hot water for tea.

COFFEE PODS COMPATIBLE
Our Gaggia manual machines come with a coffee filter for 1 or 2 cups of ground coffee, and a special filter for so called ESE (easy serve Espresso) pods. These ESE pods are perfectly portioned and make it easier to operate a manual Espresso machine.

PRESSURIZED FILTER HOLDER
The pressurized filter holder on your Gaggia machine will create an Espresso with the perfect Crema.

fields.name: Faema Carisma S1
fields.description:
New Faema Carisma S1 

The Faema Carisma is the first semiprofessional machine built by Faema with the ORIGINAL Faema E61 group

Unique Features 

Circular LCD display. for indicating the pressure/temperature in the boiler and the machine status and alarm icons
and for programming the machine parameters 

Boiler services with Smart Boiler: continuity of service at peak times.
The Smart Boiler technology increases significantly productivity for hot water and steam, by optimising the filling/topping up of the water in the boiler and the thermal balance. The result is a quality in the cup without compromises also during peak times.

Details 
-Coffee group derived from E61, with pump / water flow activation through the lever that enables the micro-switch.
-Coffee group with E61 proprietary look for:
-- front rhombus for coupling with machine body;
-- connection of the filter-holder screw.
-Filters holder and grip with FAEMA look.
- Aesthetic grips for hot water and steam delivery appearance that recalls the original E61 machines (circular ergonomic crown for gripping, with chrome cap in the middle)
-water tank capacity 2,2lt
-drip tray capacity 1lt

fields.name: De Longhi Coffee Machine EC850M
fields.description:
Thermoblock heating system
15 bar professional pressure


Stainless steel body
Illuminated flow stop buttons, to choose your favorite drink <8one or two cups of espresso coffe, capuccino, hot water or hot milk) in a simple and intuitive way.
De Longhi patented Automatic capuccino system: to obtain real capuccino and latte macchiatto automatically into the cup of glass.

Adjustable cup height up to 10 cm glasses
This appliance can be used either with ground coffee or with the Easy Serving Espresso Pods.
Professional filter holder for ground coffee and pods with crema device foe one or two cups, dedicated E.S.E pod filter (3 dedicated filters).
Self-priming system means the machine is always ready for use.
On/ off switch with indicator light.
Removable water reservoir: 1l.
Removable drip tray with water level indicator.
Anti-Drip system.
Cup shelf.
Water filter.
Energy Saving function (class A).
Automatic stand-by function.
Removable power cord (1200mm)

fields.name: Isomac Maverick Plus
fields.description: Isomac Maverick Plus Espresso coffee and cappuccino machine with on demand coffee grinder built in 430 stainless steel bright body.Group, filter holder and boiler in brass for excellent thermal stability. Group, filter holder and boiler in brass for excellent thermal stability. Steam/hot water tap with security by-pass and steam jet. Pump pressure gauge. Lever switches with LED for every machine function. Stainless steel drip tray with a double height grid to place cups.

fields.name: Traditional Italian Mezzaluna Chopper - Large
fields.description:
The classic 250mm single blade Mezzaluna for chopping garlic, chillies, onions, herbs, etc.
Mezzaluna meaning "half moon" in Italian, after the curved shape of the blade.
Great for cutting pizza and flat breads.

Also know as a Hachoir.

fields.name: Beechwood Collapsible Pasta Drying Racks
fields.description: Beechwood pasta drying rack ideal for drying all forms of long pasta including spaghetti, tagliatelle, fettuccine, vermicelli, linguine, bigoli, etc.

fields.name: Stackable Beechwood Pasta, Herb & Vegetable Dryer
fields.description:
Stackable drying frame for drying pasta, vegetables & herbs.
To dry products simply place pasta, mushrooms, tomatoes, vegetables or herbs on the mesh in a dry, well ventilated place.

Natural beechwood
Special food grade mesh
Wide holes for better air flow
Handwash only
Further frames can be added and stacked if you require additional drying space.

fields.name: Stainless Steel Passatelli Maker and Potato Ricer
fields.description:
A heavy duty, stainless steel press for making Passatelli or ricing potatoes.

Passatelli is a traditional Italian dish is typically found in Pesaro e Urbino (northern Marche), Emilia Romagna and Umbria.
Passatelli is a form of pasta made from breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, eggs, nutmeg, and lemon.
The ingredients are made into a dough then passed through the press to form long noodles. They have a wrinkled appearance and a cylindrical shape, of about 8 cm in length.
These are then cooked traditionally in chicken broth although in modern times fish and vegetable stocks are sometimes used.

The Passatelli maker comes with two interchangeable inserts.
The insert with the large holes is best used for Passatelli and the insert with the small hole for potatoes, making it great for gnocchi and smooth mashed potato.

fields.name: Stainless Steel Spaghetti Tongs
fields.description:
Stainless Steel serving tongs ideal for all types of long pasta.
Also great for serving salads.

Dishwasher safe.

fields.name: Rectangular Pizza Peel / Paddle
fields.description:
Ideal for transferring breads, pizzas, cakes and pastries into and out of a hot oven swiftly, helping to keep the oven at the correct temperature. 

Also ideal for serving pizzas, flat breads and bread, directly onto the table.

Manufactured from natural Birch Plywood 

Physical Size:500 x 230mm
Usable area/size: 375 x 230mm           

1 Pizza Peel / Paddle per pack.

fields.name: Wooden Cheese Grater Box With Drawer
fields.description:
Beautiful Beechwood cheese grater, fantastic for hard cheese such as Parmigiano, Grana, Pecorino, etc.
Complete with sliding drawer to catch and serve your cheese from.

The sharp stainless steel teeth do all the work effortlessly, making beautiful fine grated cheese.

fields.name: Ceramic Olive Oil Dispensers
fields.description:
Olive Oil dispenser/cruet in the shape of a vintage oil can complete with pourer and cap.
Perfect for the table or the kitchen.

Ceramic is one of the best materials to store your olive oil in. 
Olive oil will oxidize rapidly if it is not kept in a sealed container.
Do not store olive oil in containers made of metals such as copper or iron as the chemical reaction between the olive oil and the metal will damage the oil and may produce toxins. Also olive oil should not be stored in plastic containers as the oil may absorb PVC’s from the plastic.

fields.name: Aluminium Meat Baller Tongs
fields.description:
These Meat Baller Tongs help you create the perfect, uniform meatballs with ease. An equal size ensures that the food will cook evenly.

Great for making evenly shaped Falafel, portioning out cookie dough and brownies.

fields.name: Ravioli Stamp (Round)
fields.description:
Create fresh ravioli filled with your favourite meat, vegetables or cheese with this round ravioli stamp.

Beechwood handle
Aluminium cutter.

Hand wash only, do not leave in water.
